Description: Handle of Brindisi pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Only known from Petrie's drawing in his Journal, 1884-5, p.122, 14. cf. Desy, Ph., Les timbres amphoriques de l'Apulie republicaine (Oxford 1989) nos. 928-9.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1259)
